chat_history.message:
Hello,

The parcel with tracking number 40607480 could not be delivered due to an incorrect or incomplete address.

Please provide us with the correct address, the recipient's name, and phone number. Alternatively, you may ask the carrier to reschedule the delivery.

Thank you.



Regards


Mandi Xhaferaj

Dear ecomobile

I got your message.

I contact the client and will get back to you shortly.

Regards,
Ibrahim from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of your message.

Regards,
JH

Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini is having the following issue:

I was probably away when the delivery person passed by and I haven't received my order yet.

Thank you for your help,

Hello,

The package of the order 40607480 returned back to our warehouse.

What should we do with this parcel?

Thank you.

Valérie DECAMPS

Hi ecomobile,


Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

The customer wishes to be reimbursed for his order.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Aicha Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. We will inform out logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer yet. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
AS

Hello,

We can wait until today.

We will refund the order in 24h if it is not done yet.

Regards 
Ashley from Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
